description: Prototype that conforms to the magic-build spec. Implemented with Jenga.
name: rebel

scripts.rebel-to-ml: refmt -print ml -parse re rebel.re | sed 's/\[@explicit_arity \]//g' > rebel.ml
scripts.rebel:ml: rm src/rules.ml && refmt -print ml -parse re src/rules.re >> src/rules.ml && rm src/rebel.ml && refmt -print ml -parse re src/rebel.re >> src/rebel.ml
scripts.rebel-alt: npm run rebel:ml && npm run rebel:make && npm run rebel:cp
